project.description:
Transcrypt is a morse code translator so people can use it without any concerns of having Network Connection or beefy hardware requirements. It was made with the intent of being used to learn and disseminate the Morse Code as a language since you never know when you will need it in an emergency situation to get out of trouble or comunicate.
Made by Rickyâ˜† from Creative Endeavors Research and Development.
project.name: Transcrypt
